subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Despite a 7-21 record in his first season at Fordham, Coach Tom Pecora has begun to turn things around with the Rams, who are now 7-6 after an upset win over No. 22 Harvard.
snippet: Despite a 7-21 record in his first season at Fordham, Coach Tom Pecora has begun to turn things around with the Rams, who are now 7-6 after an upset win over No. 22 Harvard.
